name: Multy
description:
Multy is a site allowing you to share a list of URLs with a single link.
I created the site and its main feature in one weekend. I wanted to prove that realizing an idea could be quick to prototype!
After some time, Multy is now receiving thousands of visits per month and a few customers.

name: SupaNexTail
description: SupaNexTail is my first project in Typescript. It's a code base to start a SaaS project more quickly. The project is open source.

name: Travelogue
description:
Travelogue is my first website made with React (Next.js).
It allowed me to familiarize myself with the backend/frontend aspect, and the communication with a database.
